body: Wouldn't they find that it's major's body though?
is this case also appear in the real ghost in the shell animation?
Many thanks for the explanation htiger21, I was confused as well.
Nice! There's nowhere near enough Major hentai out there... which sucks as there's so much room for creativity in the GITS world.

It would appear to be some kind of murder sex play. The major plays the part of a nameless prostitute under the pretense of her job, and has sex with the guy. Guy cuts up the prosthetic body, and leaves it to be found, the Major gets a new body and the cycle starts again.
